document_api_meta.title: Inventory Search
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Retrieve inventory information for multiple products or SKUs.
**Note**: 
- Searches can be based on either product IDs or SKU IDs, not both at the same time.
- Passing Product IDs returns the inventory information of all SKUs under the specified products.
- Passing SKU IDs returns the inventory information for the specified SKUs.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: product_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A list of product IDs used to search for inventory information.
Max IDs: 100

request_body_param.name: sku_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A list of SKU IDs used to search for inventory information.
Max IDs: 600

**Note**: If both `sku_ids` and `product_ids` are passed, `sku_ids` will take precedence.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^inventory
response_param.desc: Inventory information for the requested products or SKUs.

response_param.name: ^^product_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the requested product.

response_param.name: ^^skus
response_param.desc: The list of requested SKUs.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^^total_available_quantity
response_param.desc:
The total number of units available for ordering across all warehouses.
It is the sum of the `warehouse_inventory.available_quantity` values in all warehouses.

response_param.name: ^^^total_committed_quantity
response_param.desc:
The total number of units reserved by existing customer orders across all warehouses (and therefore not available for ordering).
It is the sum of the `warehouse_inventory.committed_quantity` values in all warehouses.

response_param.name: ^^^warehouse_inventory
response_param.desc: SKU warehouse inventory information.

response_param.name: ^^^^warehouse_id
response_param.desc:
The ID of the warehouse where the SKU is stored. 
Retrieve details of the warehouse from the  [Get Warehouse List API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa418defece02be6e66b6).

response_param.name: ^^^^available_quantity
response_param.desc:
The total number of units available for ordering in this warehouse.
This is equivalent to the `inventory.quantity` value returned in the [Get Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda).

response_param.name: ^^^^committed_quantity
response_param.desc: The total number of units reserved by existing customer orders in this warehouse (and therefore not available for ordering).

response_param.name: ^^^total_available_inventory_distribution
response_param.desc: The distribution of the total available inventory for the SKU across different channels.

response_param.name: ^^^^campaign_inventory
response_param.desc: Inventory that is allocated to a specific campaign.

response_param.name: ^^^^^quantity
response_param.desc: The number of units allocated.

response_param.name: ^^^^^campaign_name
response_param.desc: The name of the associated campaign.

response_param.name: ^^^^creator_inventory
response_param.desc: Inventory that is allocated to TikTok creators.

response_param.name: ^^^^^quantity
response_param.desc: The number of units allocated.

response_param.name: ^^^^^creator_name
response_param.desc: The name of the associated TikTok creator.

response_param.name: ^^^^in_shop_inventory
response_param.desc: The remaining inventory available for the shop after deducting those allocated for campaigns and creators.

response_param.name: ^^^^^quantity
response_param.desc: The number of units allocated.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
The number of SKU exceed the limit
SKU must contain a valid warehouse.
The number of provided product IDs exceeds the limit.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
